option.name: updatedContent
option.value: RewriteEngine On RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d RewriteRule ^(.*)$ index.php [QSA,L]

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?php

class Router
{
    protected $routes = [];

    public function get($uri, $controller)
    {
        $this->routes['GET'][$uri] = $controller;
    }

    public function post($uri, $controller)
    {
        $this->routes['POST'][$uri] = $controller;
    }

    public function resolve($uri, $requestMethod)
    {
        if (array_key_exists($uri, $this->routes[$requestMethod])) {
            return $this->routes[$requestMethod][$uri];
        }

        return null;
    }
}

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?php

$router = new Router();

// Define your routes
$router->get('/', 'controllers/home.php');
$router->get('/about', 'controllers/about.php');
$router->get('/contact', 'controllers/contact.php');

return $router;
